Outstanding service! Staff went above and beyond! The room was fantastic, clean, well appointed. Excellent location! Quiet, while still in the middle of things. Great hotel for a romantic getaway. While it is a small hotel, with only 8 or 9 rooms, they are large rooms with big bathrooms. The staff directed us to great restaurants off the main streets for a much less touristy experience.

They provided a smart phone which allowed us not to use our phones and have a local number. It is definitely a hotel for couples traveling, and those wanting an excellent small boutique hotel on a small street in the Marais.

Lee from Hong Kong TripAdvisor

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Section 2" tab_id="section2"][vc_row_inner equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

What an absolutely stunning property! Appreciated the attention to detail; has a very tranquil atmosphere; something very special yet I would say great for business as for leisure guests...Would definitely recommend it!!!

Abdul from Qatar Yelp

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Section 3" tab_id="section3"][vc_row_inner equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Very nice welcome, flight delayed and running late for lunch so staff offered to call restaurant.

Room tidy and clean, decent size. Spacious and clean bathroom. Spa was being renovated which was a shame but was informed about this well in advance and complimentary breakfast added.

Hillary from United States Booking.com

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row content_placement="middle"][vc_column css_animation="right-to-left" width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1523278009804{background-color: #f3ede4 !important;}" el_class="contact-address"][vc_custom_heading text="Stay at Kalium" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]Beyond such landmarks as the Eiffel Tower and the 12th-century, Gothic Notre-Dame cathedral, the city is known for its cafe culture and designer boutiques.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]300m from Arc de Triomphe 1.3 from La tour Eiffel 3.4 from Notre-Dame[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation="none" width="2/3"][lab_google_map height="100%" zoom="13" map_options="map-style,drop-pins" map_controls="panControl,zoomControl,scaleControl" map_style="#E-8_" el_class="contact-page" css=".vc_custom_1518617832973{background-color: #2d2b2e !important;}"][lab_google_map_location marker_image="1696" retina_marker="yes" latitude="48.86052" longitude="2.2838402" marker_title="Kalium Le Marais" marker_description="48 Boulevard Jourdan 75014, Le Marais E: lemarais@hoteldemo.com TEL: +33 (23) 456-7890 "][lab_google_map_location marker_image="1696" retina_marker="yes" latitude="48.8867556" longitude="2.3413389" marker_title="Montmartre Kalium" marker_description="48 Boulevard Jourdan 75014, Montmartre E: lemarais@hoteldemo.com TEL: +33 (23) 456-7890 "][/lab_google_map][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="contact-address-row"][vc_column css_animation="bottom-to-top" width="1/2" reveal_effect="" el_class="contact-address-small-box"][lab_text_autotype typed_text="

We are located in *Le Marais;Montmartre;Saint-Germain;Passy;Montrouge;Quartier latin;*

Etto Delahaye- General Manager

item.title: Family Villa
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Elegant and comfortable room with King size bed, with down-comforters, feather beds and duvet covers, feather and non-allergic pillows, work-desk with built-in dual phone lines, Italian marble baths with separate glass endossed shower and luxury amenities, all our rooms are equipped with High Definition TV with interactive system, intelligent climatisation control system, high-speed internet cable.

item.title: Presidential Suite
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Our fourth-floor Presidential Suite is Pariss largest hotel suite, spanning 245 square metres (2,637 square feet) indoors and 10 square metres (107 square feet) outside on the furnished private balcony. Extra-high ceilings and floor-to-ceiling windows fill the two-bedroom suite with natural light, while also providing spectacular views of the 12th-century Myoho-in Temple.
